pkgmetadata.longdescription: Facilitates 'PhenoCam' Data Access and Time Series Post- Processing // Programmatic interface to the 'PhenoCam' web services (http://phenocam.sr.unh.edu). Allows for easy downloading of 'PhenoCam' data directly to your R workspace or your computer and provides post-processing routines for consistent and easy timeseries outlier detection, smoothing and estimation of phenological transition dates. Methods for this package are described in detail in Hufkens et. al (2018) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12970.
